item.title: Whoo hoo!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: It's working! Was playing with TorrentFlux last night, couldn't get it working initially. It would attempt to load the torrent and just kind of sit there, but this forum entry (Torrent Start Freez, Version 1.5 / Freez / Javascript Error) got it all working! For those of you who care, TorrentFlux is a php based system that enables the server to seed torrents. So all my torrents (as long as the server is running) will be permanently seeded. Which is friggen sweet!
